channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ata Toi + Wai
channel.desc: Join the dynamic trio Chey Milne, Tawaroa Kawana and Jordyn With A Why as they celebrate music through a distinctly M?ori lens. Hinewehi Mohi discusses her impactful musical journey. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Going Native
channel.desc: NEW: Drew explores how wild-rice is harvested by canoe, how birchbark canoes are traditionally constructed, and why it was a sacred and necessary invention of indigenous peoples.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Amplify
channel.desc: NEW: Emerging spoken word artist Zoey Roy (Cree) takes us home to Saskatoon where a meeting with the legendary Maria Campbell inspires a song about the power of celebration. Directed by Candy Fox.

channel.title: Decision to leave
channel.desc: A detective investigates a man's death in the mountains meets the dead man's mysterious wife in the course of his dogged sleuthing. (R).

channel.title: The Hui

channel.title: Autaia Haka Theatre
channel.desc: A grounded and locally-inspired piece, Pukekohe High presents a performance steeped in whenua, wh?nau, and working the land - honouring the generations who tilled the soil before them. (R).

channel.title: Ata Toi + Wai

channel.title: Ahik?roa

channel.title: Breaking Silence

channel.title: Whaik?rero

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waiata Anthems
channel.desc: In the face of historical language loss and underrepresentation, Jordyn with a Why showcases the unyielding spirit of M?ori reclamation in the digital era. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waiata Anthems
channel.desc: A decade of collaboration has forged an unbreakable creative synergy between Dillastrate?s Henare Kaa and Tim Driver, with their enduring bond ensuring that the kaupapa always comes first. (R).

channel.title: Kai T?
channel.desc: A video podcast series that provides a unique insight into the world of moko and the life of a kai t?. Artists from Kulture Ink share their personal experiences. (R).

channel.title: Uka

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Aroha Nui Say I Do
channel.desc: Papamoa-based celebrants Iripa and Jess take control of a M?ori wedding in Te Papaioea. The vows, the rehearsal, and the weather are only a few of the challenges that keep them on their toes. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hur? P?pi
channel.desc: Develops the skills of new mums and dads raising their babies in the M?ori language. (R).

channel.title: T?ku Whare K?hanga Reo
channel.desc: Communities give some much needed love to tired and run-down k?hanga across New Zealand. (R).

channel.desc: Speech therapist Bridget helps Mungzy to communicate with his wh?nau, and the parents of a young t?ne with takiw?tanga (autism) can't wait for the Puna Reo to open. (R).

channel.title: Hathi

channel.title: Mahi Pai

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: He Rourou
channel.desc: An instructional cooking series aimed at tamariki and wh?nau. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Darwin and Newts
channel.desc: An animated series for youngsters who love to figure out how things work. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: While Kura, Josh and Kazumi follow a trail of maero footprints, Rangi is playing games with rangatira o patupaiarehe on top of the misty maunga. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te N?tube
channel.desc: Two clever cousins, Atareta and Te Haakura, share their world with their followers. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kia Mau
channel.desc: A fun sing-along M?ori performing arts series for children. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Pamu Kumara
channel.desc: Tai and her superhuman wh?nau run their local vege shop from their k?mara farm. Tai and Amaia devise a plan to bust Nan out of hospital. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Cube
channel.desc: An exciting youth series and a hub for rangatahi content. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Molly Of Denali
channel.desc: NEW: The daily adventures of 10-year-old Alaska native Molly Mabray, her family, her dog Suki and her friends Tooey and Trini.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Mana Kuratahi Kapa Haka 2023
channel.desc: The top primary schools from around the Aotearoa compete at the national competition held at Trafalgar Centre, Nelson. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Mana Kuratahi Kapa Haka 2023
channel.desc: The top primary schools from around the Aotearoa compete at the national competition held at Trafalgar Centre, Nelson. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ariki 4
channel.desc: Ariki is a revolutionary M?ori martial arts series where teams of rangatahi battle it out. Based on the ancestral art form, ARIKI was created by Te Whare T? Taua o Aotearoa. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waka Huia
channel.desc: Waka Huia is an iconic archival series recording the unique stories and histories of Maori for all New Zealanders. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waka Huia
channel.desc: Waka Huia is an iconic archival series recording the unique stories and histories of Maori for all New Zealanders. (R).

channel.title: Te Ao with Moana
channel.desc: Current affairs series that puts a M?ori lens on issues that distinguishes it from other current affairs programmes. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Hui
channel.desc: A compelling mix of current affairs investigations, human interest and arts and culture stories. Made with the support of Te M?ngai P?ho and NZ on Air. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Marae
channel.desc: Your way into the M?ori world. M?iatanga, Whanaungatanga, Manaakitanga - We bring you stories with heart. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Uka
channel.desc: Semi-finals see Te K?hanga o Tokomaru play against Te Tapuaekura o Hatupatu and Puurekireki Marae against Wairere Touch Club. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Pacific Island Food Revolution
channel.desc: A joyful celebration of pacific cuisine. Across Fiji, Samoa, the Kingdom of Tonga and Vanuatu, contestants will face incredible challenges bringing Pacific Island cuisine into the spotlight. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tagata Pasifika 2025
channel.desc: NEW: The show made by Pacific people, for Pacific people - The Pacific voice on New Zealand television since 1987.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Fresh 2025
channel.desc: NEW: Our favourite flavours of the Pacific are presented in a Fresh Poly-platter in this series dedicated to inspiring Islanders worldwide.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Heritage Rescue
channel.desc: Brigid Gallagher travels NZ to visit a different heritage site each episode. Along with her team, Brigid gets the exhibition organised, creating new exhibits and uncovering fascinating stories. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hathi
channel.desc: Over the objections of his mother, a young boy follows in the footsteps of his father and grandfather to become a mahout ? elephant handler for the government. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Bamay
channel.desc: NEW: A showcase of Australia?s most diverse and stunning landscapes, shot from the air and inspired by the word Bamay, which means land in the Bundjalung language from northern New South Wales.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tapuwae Leave Only Footprints
channel.desc: Pio Terei is on a journey to discover M?ori and Hawaiian indigenous connections through tourism. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Pathfinders
channel.desc: Meet some of the living legends of Aotearoa, the M?ori leaders who were raised through the challenging years where te reo M?ori was shunned. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Nurturing Hope
channel.desc: NEW: A heart-warming factual reality tv series that follows Kaikohe mother, first language speaker Clara Aperahama Kopa and the journey to improve the life of her severely disabled son, Mungzy.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Treaty Road
channel.desc: NEW: Erin and Saxon visit Treaty 2 territory. People were forcibly displaced to create a national park. Attempts to seek justice reveal that Canadian law offers no protection to Indigenous people.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: H?kina Te M?nuka
channel.desc: PREMIERE: The M?nihera wh?nau found their healing in the teachings of their ancestors. Through their journey they have created many kaupapa and tikanga to help wh?nau navigate the modern world.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Duke
channel.desc: In 1961, Kempton Bunton, a 60 year old taxi driver, steals Goya's portrait of the Duke of Wellington from the National Gallery in London. (R).

channel.title: Whakaata M?ori
channel.desc: Whakaata M?ori specialises in the stories of Aotearoa. Be entertained and informed with news, current affairs, sports, drama, documentaries and much more.

channel.title: Marae

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Moon Tide Fishing Grass Roots
channel.desc: In the R?kaunui maramataka phase near the Manawat?whi, Nore, Mori and Dazza are hoping for some big warehenga. But they didn't count on Dazza hooking up a takeketonga. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tui Teka's Trail
channel.desc: NEW: Tui helps catch Appaloosa Rex who likes to roam Tokomaru Bay and readies Arthur the series starter horse to reunite with his owners.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tales From Zambia
channel.desc: NEW: Explore Zambia's diverse wildlife, from majestic elephants to playful baboons, through this captivating collection. Venture into breathtaking habitats and witness fascinating animal behaviours.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Michif Country
channel.desc: NEW: A glimpse into the St. Laurent M?tis nation on Lake Manitoba, taking viewers on a journey with the most active and talented hunters, trappers, and fishermen in the community.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Toa Hunter Gatherer
channel.desc: Adventurer Owen Boynton presents a holistic view of gathering kai as he travels the country to meet like-minded kaitiaki and outdoor experts. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Piri's Tiki Tour
channel.desc: Combining his love for Rugby with his skill at diving and hunting, All Black Piri Weepu sets out on a tour around Aotearoa meeting up with locals. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: East Coast Rising
channel.desc: The team struggles to find their first win, and player Sam Parkes helps the community fight against obesity. (R).
